step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood.
Drain air tanks. Close valves.
Remove right sill plate. Remove kick panel as required.
Remove seat belt assembly from floor and seat as required.
Remove right seat assembly, include disconnect air line if applicable.
Disconnect shifter cover upper and lower boot.
Disconnect shifter air line at unions.
Remove shift lever from stub shaft of tower assembly.
Remove fire extinguisher if applicable.
Position cab floor mat out of way for access to floor pan.
Remove cab floor pan for access to top of transmission.
Disconnect transmission wiring harness connectors necessary to remove transmission.
Remove Rear Transmission Support Bar with mount adapter bracket attached if applicable.
Disconnect air supply line from transmission.
Remove drive shaft.
Disconnect clutch linkage from transmission.

note.para: Clutch lever removal from the cross shaft may be necessary to allow full rotation of clutch release fork to clear the throw out bearing.

step1.para: Disconnect grease fitting.
Remove lower clutch housing inspection cover.
Remove all bell housing bolts except two.
Install transmission jack to transmission and secure.
Remove remaining bell housing bolts.
Remove transmission assembly.
Check clutch alignment.
Install transmission assembly.
Install bolts retaining transmission to engine.
Remove transmission assembly lifting jack.
Connect clutch linkage to transmission.
Adjust clutch as needed.
Install lower clutch housing inspection cover, include connect grease tube to cover.
Connect air supply line to transmission.
Install drive shaft, include torque to spec.
Install rear transmission support bar with mount adapter bracket attached if applicable.
Connect transmission wiring harness connectors, include install plastic ties.
Install cab floor pan.
Position cab floor mat.
Install fire extinguisher if applicable.
Connect shift lever to stub shaft of tower assembly, include connect air lines to unions.
Install shifter cover lower and upper seals.
Install seat assembly, include connect air line if applicable.
Install seat belt assembly to floor and to seat if applicable.
Install kick panel if removed. Install sill plate.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
